title: This $80 training package can make you a certified Microsoft IT expert
content:
Macworld

Whether you’re already a software engineer or just interested in checking out your options as a working software development professional, the training in this comprehensive Microsoft tech training bundle can help you take a big step toward learning what you need to know.

This collection brings together 11 courses packed with nearly 250 hours of training on managing and optimizing an office or even an entire business’s Windows-based tech infrastructure. All 11 courses are developed by IDUNOVA, an online learning platform boasting expert instructors in the IT field.

From managing modern desktops and Microsoft Teams to organizing users in a Microsoft 365 environment, these courses can help anyone master the intricacies of leading an organization that heavily relies on Microsoft’s tools. There are also a handful of courses in using and creating infrastructure solutions with Microsoft Azure, a highly popular public cloud platform.

Armed with all this inside knowledge of Microsoft systems, you can take certification exams to be acknowledged as a true Microsoft expert.

Grab the Complete Microsoft Tech Certification Training Super Bundle for just $79.99 for a limited time.
